name: Bit Engine
description:
An entire Unity game with only one image - a 1 x 1 pixel.  All other images are built into Unity, such as buttons and text.  This game cost $0 to make, and I therefore am not charging anything to download it. 

Gameplay:

Do whatever, honestly.  It's mostly a 2-D Particle simulator with pixels.  Mess with gravity, detonate nukes, whatever.  I recommend playing with trippy space music in the background.

Features:

27 types of bits to be used in various ways, including Gravity and Anti-gravity.

Timescale setting (Speed at which the simulation runs)

If you have any questions, concerns, or ideas to improve the game, type them into the comment section below!
